fullDescription.intro: Creates a new Keras Deep Learning Network with the specified shape, type, and batch size. Corresponds to the Keras Input Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
Tuple of integers defining the input shape.
The data type of the input.

ports.outPort: Newly created network with specified input shape and type.
